name: farmshare
description: Farmshare is the operating system for modern American farmers, enabling them to excel in the direct-to-market sales channel with tools like logistics technology optimized for shipping perishable goods and AI email marketing automation.
one_liner: Farmshare is the operating system for modern American farmers, enabling them to excel in the direct-to-market sales channel with tools like logistics technology optimized for shipping perishable goods and AI email marketing automation.
